metadado.titulo: Insercao de valor no inicio da lista

atividade.codInicializacao: CREATE_REF LIST l CREATE_STRUCT LIST WRITE_REF END_COMMAND CREATE_REF NODE n CREATE_STRUCT NODE WRITE_REF END_COMMAND READ_REF n WRITE_INFO 10 END_COMMAND READ_REF l WRITE_INFO 1 END_COMMAND READ_REF l READ_REF n WRITE_REF_FIELD INIT DELETE_REF n END_COMMAND
atividade.codSolucao: CREATE_REF NODE n CREATE_STRUCT NODE WRITE_REF END_COMMAND READ_REF n WRITE_INFO 5 END_COMMAND READ_REF n READ_REF l READ_REF_FIELD INIT WRITE_REF_FIELD NEXT END_COMMAND READ_REF l READ_REF n WRITE_REF_FIELD INIT DELETE_REF n END_COMMAND READ_REF l WRITE_INFO 2 END_COMMAND
atividade.descricao: Insira o valor 5 no incicio da lista encadeada l.
